verses.verse: O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art my God; <S%H430><s%> I will exalt <S%H7311><s%> thee, I will praise <S%H3034><s%> thy name; <S%H8034><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> wonderful <S%H6382><s%> things; thy counsels <S%H6098><s%> of old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7350><s%> are faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and truth. <S%H544><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thou hast made <S%H7760><s%> of a city <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5892><s%> a heap; <S%H1530><s%> of a defensed <S%H1219><s%> city <S%H7151><s%> a ruin: <S%H4654><s%> a palace <S%H759><s%> of strangers <S%H2114><s%> to be no city; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5892><s%> it shall never <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5769><s%> be built. <S%H1129><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall the strong <S%H5794><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> glorify <S%H3513><s%> thee, the city <S%H7151><s%> of the terrible <S%H6184><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall fear <S%H3372><s%> thee.

For <S%H3588><s%> thou hast been <S%H1961><s%> a strength <S%H4581><s%> to the poor, <S%H1800><s%> a strength <S%H4581><s%> to the needy <S%H34><s%> in his distress, <S%H6862><s%> a refuge <S%H4268><s%> from the storm, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2230><s%> a shadow <S%H6738><s%> from the heat, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2721><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> the blast <S%H7307><s%> of the terrible ones <S%H6184><s%> is as a storm <S%H2230><s%> against the wall. <S%H7023><s%>

Thou shalt bring down <S%H3665><s%> the noise <S%H7588><s%> of strangers, <S%H2114><s%> as the heat <S%H2721><s%> in a dry place; <S%H6724><s%> even the heat <S%H2721><s%> with the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of a cloud: <S%H5645><s%> the branch <S%H2159><s%> of the terrible ones <S%H6184><s%> shall be brought low. <S%H6030><s%>

And in this <S%H2088><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> shall the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> a feast <S%H4960><s%> of fat things, <S%H8081><s%> a feast <S%H4960><s%> of wines on the lees, <S%H8105><s%> of fat things <S%H8081><s%> full of marrow, <S%H4229><s%> of wines on the lees <S%H8105><s%> well refined. <S%H2212><s%>

And he will destroy <S%H1104><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the covering <S%H3875><s%> cast <S%H3874><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and the veil <S%H4541><s%> that is spread <S%H5259><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> nations. <S%H1471><s%>

He will swallow up <S%H1104><s%> death <S%H4194><s%> in victory; <S%H5331><s%> and the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> will wipe away <S%H4229><s%> tears <S%H1832><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> faces; <S%H6440><s%> and the rebuke <S%H2781><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%> shall he take away <S%H5493><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> it.

And it shall be said <S%H559><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> Lo, <S%H2009><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> is our God; <S%H430><s%> we have waited <S%H6960><s%> for him, and he will save <S%H3467><s%> us: this <S%H2088><s%> is the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> we have waited <S%H6960><s%> for him, we will be glad <S%H1523><s%> and rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in his salvation. <S%H3444><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> shall the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> rest, <S%H5117><s%> and Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall be trodden down <S%H1758><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> him, even as straw <S%H4963><s%> is trodden down <S%H1758><s%> for the dunghill. <S%H4087><s%>

And he shall spread forth <S%H6566><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of them, as <S%H834><s%> he that swimmeth <S%H7811><s%> spreadeth forth <S%H6566><s%> his hands to swim: <S%H7811><s%> and he shall bring down <S%H8213><s%> their pride <S%H1346><s%> together with <S%H5973><s%> the spoils <S%H698><s%> of their hands. <S%H3027><s%>

And the fortress <S%H4013><s%> of the high fort <S%H4869><s%> of thy walls <S%H2346><s%> shall he bring down, <S%H7817><s%> lay low, <S%H8213><s%> and bring <S%H5060><s%> to the ground, <S%H776><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> the dust. <S%H6083><s%>
